privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
Privacy Policy


At DataMB, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our website and services.


Information We Collect


1.1 Personal Information: When you subscribe to DataMB Pro, we collect your name, email address, and payment information.


1.2 Usage Data: We automatically collect information about how you interact with our website, including your IP address, browser type, pages visited, and time spent on the site.


1.3 Cookies: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and collect information about how you use our website.


How We Use Your Information


2.1 To provide and maintain our services, including processing subscriptions and payments.


2.2 To improve our website and services based on your feedback and usage patterns.


2.3 To communicate with you about your account, updates to our services, and promotional offers.


2.4 To detect and prevent fraudulent activities and ensure the security of our platform.


Data Sharing and Disclosure


3.1 Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party service providers who help us operate our business, such as payment processors and hosting services.


3.2 Legal Requirements: We may disclose your information if required by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities.


3.3 Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of the transaction.


Data Security


4.1 We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.


4.2 While we strive to protect your data, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.


Your Rights


5.1 Access and Update: You have the right to access and update your personal information through your account settings.


5.2 Data Deletion: You can request the deletion of your account and associated data by contacting us.


5.3 Opt-Out: You can opt out of receiving promotional communications from us at any time.


Children's Privacy


6.1 Our services are not intended for individuals under the age of 16, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from children.


Changes to This Policy


7.1 We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements.


7.2 We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new policy on our website or sending you an email.


Contact Us


If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at datamb.football@gmail.com or through our contact page.
